response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment that promises unparalleled benefits and returns. Given its unique features and capabilities, we believe its value exceeds $1,200,000 to us. To make this opportunity accessible to you, I am offering to sell it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a significant saving compared to its market value. We are confident that once you experience its capabilities, you will appreciate the true worth of this product. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
